RumorFact.Text: Apparently there's a new exhibit in the observatory.

ExploreFact.Text: The new exhibit in the observatory is a Nomai device that was found on Brittle Hollow.
Apparently, the device allows a user to go into the mindscape of somebody else.

RumorFact.Text: I may be able to use the Nomai device to convince Slate that the Sun is going to go supernova.

ExploreFact.Text: Slate's mind palace has a guard outside, who refuses to let me pass.

RumorFact.Text: To get past the guard, I need to know Slate's favorite memory. I may be able to figure out Slate's favorite memory by visiting the minds of the Outer Wilds Ventures astronauts.
Esker says that Slate's favorite memory probably happened before Esker was on the Attelrock.
Riebeck says that Slate's favorite memory probably revolves around an event that got Riebeck very excited, despite their usual nerves.
Gabbro says that the memory probably has to do with something Feldspar did, not something that Slate did.
Chert says that the memory probably involves a group event.
Feldspar says that the memory has to do with Outer Wilds Ventures.

ExploreFact.Text: I think I know what Slate's favorite memory is!
